Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Astacidin 2  (XXA; Pro-rich; PrAMPs, Arg-rich; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; More AMPs?)
Sequence Information.Source: hemocytes, the freshwater signal crayfish,Pacifastacus leniusculus, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Rich in Pro (35%) and Arg (35%). Active against S. flexneri ATCC 203 (MIC 0.5 uM), P. vulgaris OX19 ATCC 6380 (MIC 4.2 uM), E. coli D21 (MIC 2.1 uM), P. aeruginosa OT 97 (MIC 4.2 uM), B. megateriun B11 (MIC 1.03 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 1.06 uM), S. aureus JC-1 (MIC 4.2 uM), and M. luteus Ml 11 (MIC 5.4 uM). Updated 8/2012; 5/2017 GW; 10/2022 name fixed A.P.D.
Literature Information.Author: Jiravanichpaisal P, Lee SY, Kim YA, Andrén T, Söderhäll I.2007
Literature Information.Title: Antibacterial peptides in hemocytes and hematopoietic tissue from freshwater crayfish Pacifastacus leniusculus: characterization and expression pattern
